items.question: Looking for the title of the choral piece that opens this episode. Anyone????
items.answer: Kyrie from the Mozart Mass in C minor, my favourite choral work. I've sang in the chorus on three occasions and would never refuse the option of performing it again, and again, and again...

items.question: Looking for piece played at the end of each "Endeavor" episode?

spoilerItems.question: After the bank robbery, I know Joan feels responsible, but why did she sneak away and leave home? Why does she hate her father? I don't understand that character at all.
